## PagesAnalyticsService.userInteraction() method

Reports a user interaction event. Will perform a promis rejection if the API contains an error or if the parameters are misconfigured.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
userInteraction(eventName: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | string | the name of the event to track |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
